column1: # Добавить сюда своих вопросов. Эту строку надо пропустить при настройке CsvToBean (withSkipLines)
How should resources be loaded form jar in Java?$ClassLoader#geResourceAsStream or ClassPathResource#getInputStream%true
Which option is a good way to handle the exception?$@SneakyThrow%false
column3: Rethrow with wrapping in business exception (for example, QuestionReadException)%true

column1: What is the deadline for completing homework on the course "Developer on Spring Framework" in OTUS?$One week%false
column3: Before the end of the course%true

column1: What is the main task of an IoC container?$Creating the necessary objects and managing their lifecycle%true
column2: Converting data into an easy-to-read view%false
column3: Support for additional business logic of the application%false

column1: What is the main task of Maven?$This is a tool for automatic testing and deployment of the application%false
column2: This is a tool for automatically assembling projects based on the description of their structure in special files%true

column1: What should be put in context?$Standard classes (String, InputStream, Scanner, Locale*)%false
What is the principle of software development aimed at reducing the repetition of information of various kinds?$DRY%true
What is the principle of software development aimed at eliminating redundant functionality?$DRY%false
What is the principle of software development aimed at prohibiting the use of more complex tools than necessary?$DRY%false
